# Load Recovered PD Params

```{r}
setwd(paste0(path,"Research Project/IAT_Retest/Recovery/RecoveredParams/PD/"))
times<-c("Time1","Time2")

PDdirs <- list.dirs(path = ".", full.names = TRUE, recursive = TRUE)[-1]
d <- PDdirs[4]
for(d in PDdirs){
  for(ti in times){
    curFiles <- list.files(path=d,pattern="\\.csv$")
    id<-grep(ti,curFiles)
    output<-read.csv(paste0(d,"/",curFiles[id]))
    name<-gsub("./","",d)
    name<-gsub(" ","",name)
    assign(paste0(name,".PD.Recov.",ti),output)
  }
}

Time1<-grep(".PD.Recov.Time1",names(.GlobalEnv),value=TRUE)
Time1_list<-do.call("list",mget(Time1))
Time2<-grep(".PD.Recov.Time2",names(.GlobalEnv),value=TRUE)
Time2_list<-do.call("list",mget(Time2))

PD_recovParams <- list(Time1_list, Time2_list)
```

# PD Recovery

```{r}
PDnames<-gsub("./","",PDdirs)
PDnames<-gsub(" ","",PDnames)
paramnames<-names(PI.PD.True.Time1)[2:7]
x<-c("Study","Time",paramnames)
PDrecovDf <- matrix(nrow=length(PDnames)*2,ncol=length(x))
k<-1
for(n in PDnames){
  for(ti in 1:length(times)){
    time<-times[ti]
    timeQrecovList <- PD_recovParams[[ti]]
    timeQtrueList <- PD_trueParams[[ti]]
    curQrecov <- timeQrecovList[[ grep(n,names(timeQrecovList)) ]]
    curQtrue <- timeQtrueList[[ grep(n,names(timeQtrueList)) ]]
    
    recovVector <- c()
    for(p in paramnames){
      currentRecovery <- cor(curQrecov[,p],curQtrue[,p])
      recovVector <- c(recovVector, currentRecovery)
    }
    PDrecovDf[k,] <- c(n,time,recovVector)
    k <- k + 1
    
  }
}
colnames(PDrecovDf) <- x
PDrecovDf <- as.data.frame(PDrecovDf)
PDrecovDf[3:8] <- apply(PDrecovDf[3:8], 2, as.numeric)
```


# Quad Recovery

```{r}
Quadnames<-gsub("./","",Quaddirs)

    curQtrue <- timeQtrueList[[ grep(n,names(timeQtrueList)) ]]

      recovVector <- c(recovVector, currentRecovery)
    }
    QuadRecovDf[k,] <- c(n,time,recovVector)
    k <- k + 1
    
  }
}
colnames(QuadRecovDf) <- x
QuadRecovDf <- as.data.frame(QuadRecovDf)
QuadRecovDf[3:7] <- apply(QuadRecovDf[3:7], 2, as.numeric)
```

# Meta-Analysis

## Heterogeneity Function

```{r}
I2gen <- function(res){
  W <- diag(1/res$vi)
X <- model.matrix(res)
P <- W - W %*% X %*% solve(t(X) %*% W %*% X) %*% t(X) %*% W
100 * sum(res$sigma2) / (sum(res$sigma2) + (res$k-res$p)/sum(diag(P)))
}
```

# R to Z transform

```{r}
QuadRecovDf <- escalc(data=QuadRecovDf, measure="ZCOR", ri=ACbb1, ni=N, slab=Study, var.names=c("ACbb_Z","ACbb_SE"))
QuadRecovDf <- escalc(data=QuadRecovDf, measure="ZCOR", ri=ACwg1, ni=N, slab=Study, var.names=c("ACwg_Z","ACwg_SE"))
QuadRecovDf <- escalc(data=QuadRecovDf, measure="ZCOR", ri=D1, ni=N, slab=Study, var.names=c("D_Z","D_SE"))
QuadRecovDf <- escalc(data=QuadRecovDf, measure="ZCOR", ri=G1, ni=N, slab=Study, var.names=c("G_Z","G_SE"))
QuadRecovDf <- escalc(data=QuadRecovDf, measure="ZCOR", ri=OB1, ni=N, slab=Study, var.names=c("OB_Z","OB_SE"))
```

```{r}
PDrecovDf <- escalc(data=PDrecovDf, measure="ZCOR", ri=Ab1, ni=N, slab=Study, var.names=c("Ab_Z","Ab_SE"))
PDrecovDf <- escalc(data=PDrecovDf, measure="ZCOR", ri=Aw1, ni=N, slab=Study, var.names=c("Aw_Z","Aw_SE"))
PDrecovDf <- escalc(data=PDrecovDf, measure="ZCOR", ri=Cb1, ni=N, slab=Study, var.names=c("Cb_Z","Cb_SE"))
PDrecovDf <- escalc(data=PDrecovDf, measure="ZCOR", ri=Cp1, ni=N, slab=Study, var.names=c("Cp_Z","Cp_SE"))
PDrecovDf <- escalc(data=PDrecovDf, measure="ZCOR", ri=Cu1, ni=N, slab=Study, var.names=c("Cu_Z","Cu_SE"))
PDrecovDf <- escalc(data=PDrecovDf, measure="ZCOR", ri=Cw1, ni=N, slab=Study, var.names=c("Cw_Z","Cw_SE"))
```

```{r}
res.mod_D <- rma.mv(D_Z,D_SE, random = ~1 | Study/Time, data=QuadRecovDf )
summary(res.mod_D)
I2gen(res.mod_D)
```
